content:
-considered the most important piece of legislation in the confederation era
-provided steps of government in 3 stages:
	1.   congress would appoint a governor and a government council
		-with this people will start moving there
	2.   when 5,000 adult males would move into the territory, they would be able to elect a legislature that would be able to govern with a governor and governor staff
		-they would also be able to appoint and send a representative to go to the confederation congress
	3.   when 60,000 people move in, they would be able to apply for a formal state government
		-to do this, they had to start writing a state constitution and apply to congress
